name: DownloadMultipleSecureFiles
description: Download multiple secure files to the agent machine
author: Adrian Ochmann

inputs.name: secureFiles
inputs.label: Secure Files
inputs.helpMarkDown: The file names or GUID's of the secure files to download into the agent machine. The files will be deleted after the pipeline runs. Each filename needs to be placed in the new line or as comma separated values.

inputs.name: retryCount
inputs.label: Retry Count
inputs.helpMarkDown: Optional number of times to retry downloading a secure file if the download fails.

OutputVariables.name: secureFilePaths
OutputVariables.description: The location of the secure files that was downloaded separated by comma separated values.
